--max-concurrency.help: The maximum number of cores to use in processing. Default: 4

--resize-to.help: Scale image width for tie-point extraction. Default: 800

--zoom.help: The level of DEM construction. 2 means 2x native GSD. Default: 2 Values: 1, 2, 4, 8

--matcher-distance.help: Distance threshold in meters to find pre-matching images based on GPS exif data.

--multi-scale.help: Uses an image file pair based multi-scale tie-point generation routine similar to Photoscan.

-h.help: show this help message and exit
